title: Ryze's new cinematic ??
body: Can we see it before the day 26 of July ??? As well as the whole Runeterra Map.

replies.body: Ah btw Riot accidentally released yesterday a new story about Brand.  Looks like his human host was Ryze's apprentice. Sadly they deleted it because it was released too early
The same goes for a new Syndra story(also I think Akalis bio was released by accident,though they didn't delete it,because its not tied to the event anyway)

I imagined the reason was something similar, I definitely like the chance to better understand the champ when it's revealed, past releases caused quite a lot of confusion and misinformation (that lead to unjustified critics).
Thanks for trying to give us the bio earlier! :)

Thats really good to hear.
I remember the confusion that was happening here on the boards during the release of {{champion:145}},where everyone(me included) thought she was actually inside the void and it caused all kinds of misconceptions.
It could be any moment. But the new icons warn't listed in the new patch coming tomorrow. So its possible not these 2 coming weeks or riot are plotting an surprise event.

> [{quoted}](name=Camille Ferrøs,realm=EUNE,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=Ur4kO4lU,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2018-07-17T20:44:45.214+0000)
>
> It could be any moment. But the new icons warn't listed in the new patch coming tomorrow. So its possible not these 2 coming weeks or riot are plotting an surprise event.

The new icons will be exposed only when there comes the new event

>
> The new icons will be exposed only when there comes the new event

Makes sense. I hope its these few coming days

> It could be any moment. But the new icons warn't listed in the new patch coming tomorrow. So its possible not these 2 coming weeks or riot are plotting an surprise event.

They were on surrenderat20
I checked on the official riot page for patches and it was not listed there ...
